intro: Macleania tenuiflora, commonly known as the slender-flowered macleania, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is a shrub native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are typically opposite, simple, and elliptical in shape. Macleania tenuiflora is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
